name: Sphinx Pose
setup: Place forearms on mat, elbows under shoulders
Palms flat or fists if wrists are sensitive
Legs extended behind, feet hip-width apart
steps: Press forearms down to lift chest
Draw shoulder blades down and back
Relax hips and legs into mat
Breathe deeply, hold for prescribed time
safety: Gentle backbend. If lower back feels pinched, reduce lift or widen elbows. Great for chest opening post-bench press.

regressions: Crocodile pose (forehead on stacked hands, minimal extension)

prescriptionHints.notes: Hold 3-5 min for yin practice. Gentle spinal extension and chest opening.

joints.notes: Keep shoulders down. Avoid excessive lumbar compression—lengthen spine, don't crunch.
